topic.title: Noob Here: I created a ZeroID, do I have to backit up if I change device?
topic.body: During creation it didn't ask for any sort of password, how do I reserve this username?

1537441126_1EE82bk83Kdxmz5dTxMvZXUuwCj8b.body: Thank you everyone for the answers, I missed the faq section. I'll read it.
